gwt.material.design.client.data

Interface DataView<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.google.gwt.event.shared.HasHandlers, com.google.gwt.view.client.HasKeyProvider<T>, com.google.gwt.view.client.HasRows
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDataTable, AbstractDataView, InfiniteDataView, MaterialDataTable, MaterialInfiniteDataTable, StandardDataView

    public interface DataView<T>
extends com.google.gwt.view.client.HasRows, com.google.gwt.view.client.HasKeyProvider<T>
    A data view is in charge of rendering the data within the data table.
    Author:
    Ben Dol
